articles.description: A total of 294 shares changed hands on the counter till 10:15AM (IST)
articles.content:
Shares of Bajaj Holdings & Investment Ltd. gained 1.77 per cent to Rs 4732.4 in Monday's session as of 10:15AM (IST) even as the equity benchmark Sensex traded 555.02 points higher at 53283.0.

articles.title: India vs Ireland T20 match: Great to start the series with a win, says Hardik Pandya
